TopicTitle: Changed orbit of asteroid in cheat menu?

Articles.Content:
So I did something interesting... As the title says, I somehow changed the orbit of an asteroid (AST. HSJ-227) through the cheat menu... How it happened? I don’t know. All I know is that I was attempting to set a station into orbit through the cheat menu and next thing I know I’m looking at an asteroid orbiting Kerbin in a circular 125KM orbit.

Knowing that this was out of place, I thought I could revert back to launch and it would be fine. But, the option to revert wasn’t available, due to the fact my station was still on the pad. 

So I thought I could simply change the orbit of the asteroid again through the cheat menu. But it says there’s no active craft. 

Thoughts anybody?
